name: LylParse
code:
/**
 * Transform a lyl style block to CSS
 *
 * Allowed blocks:
 *
 * // Simple
 * const BUTTON_STYLE = lyl `{
 *   padding: 8px 12px
 *   font-size: 14px
 *   border-radius: 9px
 *   border: 1px solid #e0e0e0
 * }`
 *
 * // Nesting
 * const style = lyl `{
 *   ul > {
 *     li {
 *       list-style-type: none
 *     }
 *   }
 *   p {
 *     ~ {
 *       span {
 *         opacity: 0.8
 *       }
 *     }
 *   }
 * }`
 *
 */
export class LylParse {
    toCss()
}
